name: yt-dlp-mcp
description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that bridges Video & Audio content with Large Language Models using yt-dlp.
readme_summary: The yt-dlp-mcp repository provides a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that acts as a bridge between video and audio content from platforms like YouTube and Large Language Models. It leverages yt-dlp to enable AI agents to search, extract metadata, download content, and generate transcripts from video and audio sources using natural language commands.
key_features: Privacy & Safety (direct downloads, Zod schema validation)
primary_use_case: Integrating video and audio content with Large Language Models and AI agents for tasks such as information retrieval, content analysis, and automated workflows.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled librarian stands amidst towering shelves filled with video tapes and audio reels, acting as a translator for a curious robot. The librarian carefully extracts information from the media, converting it into glowing data streams that the robot readily consumes. Small UI elements float around the librarian, displaying search queries and transcript snippets. The scene is set in a futuristic library with soft, warm lighting. Digital particles representing audio and video data subtly connect the physical media to the digital realm. The composition is clean and focused, with a balanced color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: BubbleLab
description: Open source workflow automation platform built for developers - full observability and code exportability!
readme_summary: Bubble Lab is an open-source workflow automation platform designed for developers. It offers full observability, allowing users to monitor execution, track token usage, and debug workflows. A key feature is the ability to export workflows as clean, production-ready TypeScript code, providing control and portability.
key_features: Full Observability (execution tracing, logs, token usage, performance metrics)
Export as TypeScript (code generation for portability)
primary_use_case: Automating workflows with full control, transparency, and type safety, enabling developers to own, debug, and deploy workflows anywhere.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled architect stands before a complex blueprint, effortlessly assembling interconnected bubbles representing various integrations and tools into a flowing, automated system. Each bubble glows with a distinct color, indicating its function. The architect uses a tablet displaying a TypeScript code snippet, reflecting the final exported workflow. Digital particles stream between the bubbles, visualizing data flow. The scene is set in a bright, modern design studio with a large window overlooking a futuristic cityscape. The composition is clean and focused with a blue and green color scheme. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: posterizarr
readme_summary: Posterizarr is a PowerShell script with a Web UI that automates the creation of textless posters for media libraries in Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby. It fetches artwork from various sources, applies custom overlays and text, and integrates with other media server tools.
primary_use_case: Automated generation of textless posters for media libraries.
cover_image_prompt: A meticulous librarian in a grand, digital library, carefully replacing movie posters with pristine, textless versions. The librarian uses a magical brush that extracts text from posters, leaving behind stunning, clean artwork. Behind them, shelves are filled with both original and textless posters, subtly glowing with digital particles. A small UI element displays the Posterizarr logo. The scene is set in a brightly lit, organized library with a warm color scheme. The image should be in a flat design style with clear iconography and vibrant colors.

name: Web-Navigator
description: Web-Navigator is an agent for web browsing and scraping websites.
readme_summary: Web-Navigator is a Python-based web browsing and scraping agent. It leverages LLMs and the Playwright framework to automate web tasks such as navigation, content interaction, searching, and file downloading. The agent is designed to adapt to dynamic web pages and streamline complex workflows.
primary_use_case: Automating web browsing and scraping tasks to improve productivity and save time.
cover_image_prompt: A skilled navigator stands at the helm of a ship, charting a course through a sea of web pages represented as islands. The navigator uses a glowing compass powered by a miniature LLM to find the best routes. The ship's sails are made of Playwright code, propelling it forward. The scene shows the navigator discovering valuable data (represented as treasure chests) on various islands. Small UI elements float around the scene, displaying search queries and website interactions. The composition is clean and focused with a blue and green color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: flycut-caption
description: A complete video subtitle editing React component with AI-powered speech recognition and visual editing capabilities.
readme_summary: FlyCut Caption is a React component for video subtitle editing, leveraging AI-powered speech recognition. It offers features like visual subtitle editing, real-time video preview, multi-format export, and subtitle style customization, making it a comprehensive tool for creating and editing video subtitles.
primary_use_case: Creating and editing video subtitles using AI-powered speech recognition and visual editing tools.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled sculptor meticulously chiseling subtitles onto a flowing ribbon of film. The sculptor uses a set of advanced digital tools, represented by glowing UI elements hovering nearby, to refine the text and timing. The film ribbon passes through an AI-powered speech recognition engine, visualized as a crystalline brain, which generates the initial subtitles. The scene is set in a bright, modern studio with subtle code snippets projected onto the walls. The composition is clean and focused, with a vibrant color scheme. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and vibrant colors.

name: Foxel
description: A highly extensible private cloud storage solution for individuals and teams, featuring AI-powered semantic search.

name: nginx-ignition
description: An user interface for the nginx web server, aimed at developers and enthusiasts that don't want to manage configuration files manually
readme_summary: nginx-ignition is a user interface for the nginx web server, designed for developers and enthusiasts who prefer managing nginx configurations through a GUI rather than manually editing configuration files. It offers features like virtual host management, stream configuration, SSL certificate handling, user access control, and integrations with Docker and Tailscale.
key_features: Multiple nginx virtual hosts with customized domains, routes, and bindings
Multiple nginx streams with domain-based routing, circuit breakers, and weights
Host route options: proxy, redirection, custom code execution (JavaScript/Lua), static response, or static file serving
Easy configuration of nginx server settings (body size, timeouts, log level)
SSL certificate management (Let's Encrypt, self-signed, custom) with automatic renewal
Server and virtual host access/error logs with rotation
Multiple users with attribute-based access control (ABAC)
TrueNAS support for proxying to apps hosted on NAS
Native Docker integration for easy container proxy target selection
Built-in Tailscale VPN support for exposing hosts in Tailnet networks
Access lists for controlling access using basic authentication and/or source IP checks
primary_use_case: Simplifying nginx configuration management through a user-friendly interface.
cover_image_prompt: Imagine a skilled conductor orchestrating a complex network of servers with a user-friendly control panel. The conductor adjusts dials and levers on the panel, visually representing the configuration of virtual hosts, streams, and SSL certificates. Wires representing data flow connect the panel to miniature servers, each glowing with activity. A subtle UI overlay shows configuration options. The scene is set in a modern server room with soft, ambient lighting. Small digital particles flow around the wires, visualizing data transmission. The composition is balanced and focused, with a clear visual hierarchy. The image should be in 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and rich details.

name: flat
description: Project flat is the Web, Windows and macOS client of Agora Flat open source classroom.
readme_summary: The 'flat' repository provides the Web, Windows, and macOS client for Agora Flat, an open-source classroom platform. It offers features like real-time interaction (whiteboard, RTC, RTM), login via GitHub and WeChat, classroom management, recording/replaying capabilities, cloud storage, and screen sharing.
key_features: Classroom management (join, create, schedule classrooms, periodic rooms)
Classroom recording and replaying (whiteboard, cloud recording, messaging)
primary_use_case: Providing client-side applications (Web, Windows, macOS) for an open-source online classroom environment.
cover_image_prompt: A friendly schoolteacher stands in front of a large, glowing whiteboard that displays interactive lessons and video feeds of students. The teacher uses a digital pen to write on the board, which instantly updates on the students' screens. A subtle UI overlay shows classroom management tools. The scene is set in a bright, modern virtual classroom with a warm and inviting atmosphere. Small digital particles float around the whiteboard, representing real-time data transfer. The repository name, 'Flat,' is subtly displayed on a banner in the background. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with vibrant colors and clear details.

name: chrome-devtools-mcp
readme_summary: The `chrome-devtools-mcp` repository provides a Model-Context-Protocol (MCP) server that allows coding agents (like Gemini, Claude, Cursor, or Copilot) to control and inspect a live Chrome browser. It leverages Chrome DevTools and Puppeteer for reliable automation, in-depth debugging, and performance analysis within the browser environment.
key_features: Get performance insights using Chrome DevTools to record traces and extract actionable performance insights.
Advanced browser debugging: Analyze network requests, take screenshots and check the browser console.
Reliable automation using puppeteer to automate actions in Chrome and automatically wait for action results.
primary_use_case: Enabling AI coding assistants to interact with and control a Chrome browser for automation, debugging, and performance analysis.
cover_image_prompt: A detective meticulously examining a complex web of interconnected pipes and wires, representing the inner workings of a web application. The detective uses a magnifying glass (Chrome DevTools) to trace the flow of data, identifying bottlenecks and anomalies. Small screens display snippets of code and performance metrics, subtly connecting the scene to software. The setting is a dimly lit, futuristic laboratory with glowing cables and holographic displays. The image should be in a 3D isometric illustration style with rich details and a dark blue and purple color scheme.
